HERO.SUBTITLE: I am Takie Eldeen, a Frontend Engineer specializing in building scalable, production-ready systems with React, Next.js, and TypeScript.

TECH.TITLE: Tools & Technologies
TECH.SUBTITLE_H3: Building a website takes more than just some tools.
TECH.SUBTITLE_P: It’s about understanding how the pieces fit together, making decisions that actually improve the user experience, and knowing when to write code or when to rely on the right library. Tools help, but the real work is in how you use them.

WORKFLOW.TITLE: How I Work
WORKFLOW.SUBTITLE: From the first idea to the final product, I follow a refined process designed to deliver high-quality results predictably and efficiently.
WORKFLOW.STEP1_DESC: Deep dive into your goals, target audience, and project requirements to set a solid foundation.
WORKFLOW.STEP2_DESC: Designing intuitive UI/UX and architecting the system structure for scalability and performance.
WORKFLOW.STEP3_DESC: Turning designs into reality with clean, performant code and modern engineering practices.
WORKFLOW.STEP4_DESC: Rigorous testing followed by a smooth deployment and post-launch monitoring for success.
WORKFLOW.CTA_SUBTITLE: Let's turn your vision into a professional digital solution.

SKILLS.PERF_DESC: Optimizing UI Performance for better User Experience
SKILLS.API_DESC: Designing robust data flows between clients, servers, and databases.
SKILLS.STATE_DESC: Every State needs to be designed carefully
SKILLS.STATE_ITEM_DESC: Responsible for all imports and exports.
SKILLS.STATE_EMPTY_DESC: Start by inserting the data for your first employee in the system.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: A collection of selected works where I combined design thinking with engineering to solve real-world problems.
PROJECTS.AGZ_B2B_DESC: A sophisticated management system for pharmacy chains. Includes branch-wide inventory tracking, granular RBAC permissions, and real-time fulfillment monitoring. Built with a robust backend to handle complex enterprise logic.
PROJECTS.AGZ_B2C_DESC: A localized e-commerce experience for medicine ordering. Features real-time branch finding via Leaflet maps, multi-step ordering, and secure Stripe integration. Fully responsive and SEO-optimized.
PROJECTS.ESTATEIN_DESC: A premium real estate website featuring dynamic property listings and optimized routing. Developed with the Next.js App Router for superior performance and SEO. Integrated Puppeteer and Supabase.
PROJECTS.INVOO_DESC: A comprehensive invoice management solution featuring CRUD operations, admin monitoring, and user role management. Supports bilingual interfaces (EN/AR), Dark/Light modes, and detailed activity logs.

CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to explore possibilities, I'm always open to discussing new opportunities.
CONTACT.FOOTER: Based in Egypt • Available for interesting collaborations
